questions.question: Which of the following underlined parts is different in pronunciation from the others?
questions.explanation: 需要分析每个单词划线部分的发音，找出发音不同的选项。

questions.question: You are ________ member of the reading club.
questions.explanation: member以辅音音素开头，前面用不定冠词a。

questions.question: I'm afraid my answer is different ________ yours.
questions.explanation: different from是固定搭配，表示'与...不同'。

questions.question: The kids gave the books to you and ________.
questions.explanation: 介词to后面需要宾格形式，you and me作介词to的宾语。

questions.question: Look! He ________ the ball to Peter on the playground.
questions.explanation: Look!表示正在进行的动作，用现在进行时。

questions.question: We have ________ PE lessons than Lisa every week.
questions.explanation: than表示比较级，PE lessons是可数名词复数，用more修饰。

questions.question: ________ words do you often hear in an art lesson?
questions.explanation: 询问在美术课上经常听到什么单词，用what提问。

questions.question: — Lucy, let me show you around our school. — ________ .
questions.explanation: 对别人的帮助表示感谢，用Thank you very much。
